predicate.note: Frames file for 'differentiate' based on sentences in wsj. No access to verbnet at the moment.

roleset.name: cause or point out a difference

example.name: differentiate between
example.text: Certainly conservative environmentalists can defend their limited government position by [*-1] differentiating between Old Environmentalism and New Environmentalism (``Journalists and Others for Saving the Planet,'' by David Brooks, editorial page, Oct. 5).

example.name: arg1 unstated
example.text: Producers also are trying [*-2] to differentiate by concentrating on higher-profit output, such as coated and electrogalvanized products, which remain beyond the reach of minimills.
example.arg: concentrating on higher-profit output, such as coated and electrogalvanized products, which remain beyond the reach of minimills
example.note: Arg1 here defaults to 'among themselves' or something like that.
